meanings.definition: A mixture of dried petals and spices used to scent the air.
meanings.sent1: I placed a bowl of potpourri in the living room to make it smell nice.
meanings.sent2: She filled small sachets with potpourri to give as gifts to her friends.
meanings.sent3: The potpourri in the bathroom made it feel like a garden in bloom.
meanings.sent4: The potpourri of scents in the air was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent5: The potpourri of lavender and rose petals created a calming atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A collection of diverse items or elements.
meanings.sent1: The antique shop had a potpourri of old books, jewelry, and furniture.
meanings.sent2: Her room was a potpourri of colors, with each wall painted a different shade.
meanings.sent3: The potpourri of snacks at the party was a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: The city was a potpourri of cultures, with people from all over the world.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a potpourri of flowers, each one more beautiful than the last.
